description: The England-style opt-out system would see people presumed to have given consent to donate organs.
title: Isle of Man organ donation law change moves forward
title_page: Isle of Man organ donation law change moves forward - BBC News
maintext: Mr Perkins was given leave to introduce the bill for a second time in October 2019 after the original permission granted in 2017 expired following delays caused by changes to the English laws and the need to draft Brexit-related legislation.
